seo.title: AI Product Mockups for Launch Pages | BoostUGC

heroImage.prompt: Bold ecommerce hero shot with product floating slightly above surface, dramatic rim light, smooth gradient background in brand colors, soft reflections, premium modern aesthetic. 1:1.
heroImage.alt: Floating product hero mockup with dramatic lighting.

sections.heading: Why Hero Images Matter
sections.body: The hero image is the first impression on any landing page. A clean, bold, and premium-looking visual can increase conversion rates instantly.

sections.heading: What Makes a High-Converting Hero Image
sections.body:
Strong lighting. Highlights edges and texture.

Minimal background. Avoid distractions.

Clear focus. The product must be unmistakable.

Brand colors. Reinforce the visual identity.
sections.imagePrompt: Floating product shot with brand color gradient background, crisp rim lighting, high clarity. 1:1.
sections.imageAlt: Floating product with branded gradient background.

sections.heading: Why AI Mockups Are a Game-Changer
sections.body: AI mockups allow you to create hero images in multiple styles, colors, and angles without needing 3D artists or photographers.

sections.heading: Best Practices
sections.body:
• Use gradients sparingly.
  • Keep the product centered.
  • Use soft shadows for realism.
  • Test multiple color variations.
sections.imagePrompt: Hero shot variations of same product across different gradient backgrounds. 1:1.
sections.imageAlt: Hero shot variations showing different gradient backdrops.

sections.heading: Final Takeaway
sections.body: AI product mockups give brands the ability to test unlimited hero designs quickly and affordably, improving launch performance across all channels.
